price: Lakini hatukupata humo ila nyumba moja tu yenye Waislamu!
arabic: فَمَا وَجَدۡنَا فِيهَا غَيۡرَ بَيۡتٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ
footnotes: Lakini hatukukuta ila nyumba moja tu ndiyo ya Waislamu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: famā wajadnā fīhā ghayra baytin mina al-mus'limīna
